Text:
GREAT upload, 

it would be nice if u could do 
a 1280*720 or 720*404 rip(with the subtitles hardcoded) ,we won't mind the extra MBs .

That resolution which I did was playable in my ol' 1st gen netbook without a glitch..when I tried to up the rez a bit to the original hdtv of 720x404 it was stuttering now and then. That's why I cut off about 50 pixels on both sides.


I wanted to make a small file (
